name: emk
description: ECMAScript Make - a build tool for the JavaScript elite

scripts.build: mkdir -p build/component && cp src/component/*.js build/component && jison ./src/component/grammar.jison ./src/component/lex.jisonlex -o build/component/parser.js && cp src/main/* build/

author: Blake Regalia <blake.regalia@gmail.com> (blake-regalia.com)
